statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir='🧠KC'; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name' | sed 's/claude-//' | sed 's/-20.*//'); branch=$(cd "F:\\vcia-1307\\vcia_dhl" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'main'); files_md=$(find F:\\vcia-1307\\vcia_dhl -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l || echo '0'); qdrant_status=$(curl -s --connect-timeout 1 http://qdr.vcia.com.br:6333/health 2>/dev/null | grep -q '"status":"ok"' && echo '✅' || echo '❌'); ollama_status=$(curl -s --connect-timeout 1 http://localhost:11434/api/tags 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'models' && echo '🟢' || echo '🔴'); chunks_count=$(curl -s --connect-timeout 1 http://qdr.vcia.com.br:6333/collections/knowledge-consolidator 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.result.points_count' 2>/dev/null || echo '0'); convergence=$(if [ -f F:\\vcia-1307\\vcia_dhl\\CONVERGENCE-BREAKTHROUGH.md ]; then echo '🎯'; else echo ''; fi); changes=$(cd "F:\\vcia-1307\\vcia_dhl" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l || echo '0'); change_color=$(if [ "$changes" -gt "10" ]; then echo '\033[31m'; elif [ "$changes" -gt "5" ]; then echo '\033[33m'; else echo '\033[32m'; fi); tailscale_status=$(tailscale status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'vcia' && echo '🔗' || echo ''); time=$(date '+%H:%M'); printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[35m[%s]\033[0m \033[32m🌿%s\033[0m ${change_color}✏️%s\033[0m \033[34m📄%s\033[0m Qdr:%s Oll:%s \033[33m🔮%s\033[0m %s%s \033[90m%s\033[0m" "$dir" "$model" "$branch" "$changes" "$files_md" "$qdrant_status" "$ollama_status" "$chunks_count" "$convergence" "$tailscale_status" "$time"
